name: Resource Gatherer
description:
Keyboard and mouse:

-press "i" for opening and closing inventory

-left mouse click to swing sword or hold it for using the work stations

-use "a" and "d" for walking left and right.

-use "space bar" or "w" for jumping

Controller (xbox refers to an xbox controller):

-use "left joystick-horizontal" or "D-Pad horizontal" for walking

-use "south button / A on xbox" or "left joystick-up" for jumping

-use "west button / X on xbox" or "Right trigger" for using sword, only trigger will work for use of the work stations

-use "north button/ Y on xbox" for opening and closing the inventory

How to play:

-hold mouse button over furnace to make bars.

-use anvil to fuse 2 bars into one

-use workbench to make tools

-kill bosses to unlock new swords

-enemies take knockback use that to your advantage

How to save the game:

-click the save button at your base, right bottom corner

-double click the save file

-if it is all blue Ctrl+C

-Ctrl+V it somewhere you won't lose it

How to load the game:

-open the game up

-click load button

-insert your save at the bottom text and confirm

-click start game
